title: _SET_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER
content:
0x4757F00BC6323CFE// SetWeaponDamageModifier
void _SET_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER(Hash weaponHash, float damageMultiplier);Parameters:weaponHash: Hash of the weapondamageMultiplier: Damage MultiplierChanges the weapon damage output by the given multiplier value.
Does NOT need to be called every frame.Old name:  _SET_WEAPON_DAMAGE_MODIFIER_THIS_FRAMEExamples:LuaSetWeaponDamageModifier(`WEAPON_CARBINERIFLE`, 0.8)
